title: Steal a Githyanki Egg
content: lits. Keep going and then turn right at (X: -39, Y: -126) to find Lady Esther. If you speak to her she'll talk about how she was trying to buy an egg off of the Githyankis at the Creche. If you ask her why she wants to get a Githyanki egg, she'll explain that the Society of Brilliance wants to hatch one for their own and raise them to see if they'll still be as violent.
